attributes.action: Investigate the conflict of interest of David Gills Appointment as FA Vice-President and the impartiality and fitness for purpose of the FA
attributes.additional_details: Following the appointment of Manchester United Chief-Executive David Gill as Vice-President of the Football Association, we, the undersigned call upon the government to take action and instigate an investigation into the clear conflict of interest in David Gills appointment and the impartiality and fitness for purpose of the Football Association.

rejection.details: This a matter for the FA.
